title: No-op: Valentine page already matches requested prompt and interactions
constraints: Do not edit any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only shadcn components); compose them instead if needed.
Do not edit immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., `frontend/src/main.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`).
Keep the app fully client-side; do not add external services or backend dependencies for this page.
Backend must remain single-actor Motoko; only add `migration.mo` if persistent state changes are introduced (not needed for this request).
nonGoals: Adding authentication (Internet Identity) to the Valentine page.
Adding any backend APIs or persistence for the Valentine interaction.
Adding additional pages, routes, or features beyond the Yes/No Valentine prompt and the Yes-confirmation meme view.
